Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsi was watching the moon on a clear night from my window may\18th\2012 at 2:48am and noticed a white glowing orb going over the top right of the moon.as i watched to see if it was a plane it slowed down over another bigger object on the left side of the moon, as i ran down my dark yard i leaned against my building to steady my camera and i saw the first orb speed up over the bigger one that had the different colored lights on it and change shape, then there were 2 white orbs and the big object there which made three,and it was huge. the sky was dark and thats how i first noticed them. i wasn't sure what it was but knew it wasn't a normal object cause it slowed down the went faster. the bigger ufo was fading in and out but my camera caught the lights on it and i steadyied myself by leaning against the building to get a better video of it all, the saw the 2 brighter one's which really freaked me out even now cause this isn't the first time i saw something in the night skies, i bought a sony 70 times 2000x zoom handycam and decided to catch the moon colors that night and caught these instead,i lost site of the big ufo with the colored lights as i tried to follow the 2 white lights, the bigger ufo was lost and ended up with what i am sending mufon now. i have another video and pics of a ufo that flew fast my house while recording a chopper in the daytime and will be sending it to you later and very soon. thank you for believing in what we see and do catch on video.

Summary: 2 bright ufo's orbs and 1 really big shaped ufo
